body_html:
@AFAgarap For future note, please cut-and-paste text into your issues, rather than attaching screenshots.

Please answer the following question:

Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN:
(please attach the output of ls -l /path/to/cuda/lib/libcud*):

Also note that the following two errors seem to indicate a mix-up between cuda 7.5 and 8.0:

/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so.5 is not a symbolic link
Couldn't open CUDA library libcudnn.so. LD_LIBRARY_PATH: :/usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64

body:
@AFAgarap For future note, please cut-and-paste text into your issues, rather than attaching screenshots.

Please answer the following question:

---

Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN: 
(please attach the output of `ls -l /path/to/cuda/lib/libcud*`):

---

Also note that the following two errors seem to indicate a mix-up between cuda 7.5 and 8.0:

`/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so.5 is not a symbolic link`
`Couldn't open CUDA library libcudnn.so. LD_LIBRARY_PATH: :/usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64`
